name: BLOODLUST (lung_)
description:
You're a vampire out to fuel your bloodlust. Your health is healed by killing enemies and goes down naturally, even more when you get hit. Luckily, if you use your left click, you dash, giving you a short window of invincibility.

Made in a few hours, with love. :

Controls - WASD - Move

MLB - Dash

Basic mechanic idea and such by my friend AnonymousKoala <3
